callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg
callbehavioraction.documentation: The organization and projects need to identify the specific knowledge information to capture and manage. Considerations include the importance and cost effectiveness of capturing the knowledge. If there is no identified project that will benefit from the knowledge asset, then it probably should not be considered.
callbehavioraction.qualifiedName: Organizational Poject-Enabling Processes::Knowledge Management::Knowledge Management::Plan knowledge management::Establish the scope of the KM strategy
